thread.title: Five bad taxes that should be axed right now
thread.title_full: Five bad taxes that should be axed right now

author: Allister Heath
title: Five bad taxes that should be axed right now
text: Comment Five bad taxes that should be axed right now Many of the taxes the Government levies are wrong or counter-productive as they depress or distort economic activity Air Passenger Duty has risen six times in as many years and travellers from Britain are among the highest taxed in the world Photo: AP
